concept.title: Search Relevance Example
concept.shortdesc: This next section is so we can show an example of the Relevance Ranking search feature in Reverb 2.0.

conbody.p:
The ePublisher Express Trial guild talks about this feature and others. We walk you through all the features in the Search Showcase section of the guide. So, you can ignore the next couple of sections and move on down to
Creating Your Own Content and Using Media Assets
